control.description: Group recording items by folder structure

control.label: $INFO[Window(Home).Property(LabelFilterTHREE)]
control.visible: Window.IsVisible(DialogSubtitles.xml) | Window.IsVisible(DialogSettings.xml) | Window.IsVisible(VideoOSD.xml) | Window.IsVisible(MusicOSD.xml) | Window.IsVisible(MyPlaylist.xml) | Window.IsVisible(SmartPlaylistRule.xml)
